levelList.desc:
<style="highlight">At 5+ [Breath], Coin Power -1</style>
[StartBattle] Apply 1 [BladeResultUpTier1] to (highest A-Reson.) other Blade Lineage allies in ascending order of Speeds (slowest to fastest, 4 times max)
<style="highlight">- If there are 6 or more allied Blade Lineage Identities in the Encounter, apply 2 instead</style>
[WhenUse] Gain +3 [Breath] Count
levelList.name: Draw of the Sword

levelList.desc:
<style="highlight">At 7+ [Breath], Coin Power -1</style>
[StartBattle] Apply 1 [BladeResultUpTier2] to (highest A-Reson.) other Blade Lineage allies in ascending order of Speeds (slowest to fastest, 2 times max)
<style="highlight">- If there are 6 or more allied Blade Lineage Identities in the Encounter, apply 2 instead</style>
[WhenUse] Gain +4 [Breath] Count
[WinDuel] Gain 1 Slash Power Up next turn
levelList.name: Acupuncture

levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +3 Aggro to this Skill Slot next turn
[WhenUse] Clash Power -1 for every 5 [Breath] on self (Max 6)
[WhenUse] Until this Skill ends, this unit cannot be Staggered from taking damage
[WinDuel] Gain 5 [Breath]
[DefeatDuel] After getting hit, use 'To Claim Their Bones' Skill
[CriticalActivated] Deal +4% more damage on Critical Hit for every Poise Potency on self (Max 100%)
+50% Damage on Critical Hit
Deal +0.5% more damage per 1% missing HP on self (Max 25%)
levelList.name: Yield My Flesh

levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain 2 Slash Power Up next turn
<style="highlight">Deal +1.0% more damage for every 1% missing HP on self (Max 50%)</style>
levelList.name: Overthrow

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict Pride Affinity damage equal to ([Breath] on self * 2)

levelList.desc:
<style="highlight">[BeforeAttack] For every 7 [Breath] on self, Atk Weight +1 (Max +3)</style>
[WhenUse] Final Power +1 for every 5 [Breath] on self (Max 6)
[WhenUse] Until this Skill ends, this unit cannot be Staggered from taking damage
[WhenUse] Deal +4% more damage on Critical Hit for every Poise Potency on self (Max 100%)
+<style="highlight">30</style>% Damage on Critical Hit
Deal +1.0% more damage for every 1% missing HP on self (Max 50%)
<style="highlight">If this Skill targets only a single enemy, deal +100% more damage (In Focused Encounters, a single Part)</style>
[WhenUse] Apply 2 '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Damage Up' and '2 (Corresponding Sin Affinity) Power Up' to (4 + # of highest Reson.) allies.
- At 4+ Corresponding Reson., apply 2 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Damage Up'
- At 5+ Corresponding Reson., apply 2 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Power Up'
- At 6+ Corresponding A-Reson., apply the above effects next turn as well
levelList.name: To Claim Their Bones

levelList.desc:
If the target has 7+ [Laceration], Coin Power -2
[OnSucceedEvade] After Successfully Evading, use 'Overthrow' Skill
